creator: ce@publishing-etc.de
text:
According to the openoffice.org Excel file format specification (http://sc.openoffice.org/
excelfileformat.pdf), section 4.3.1, method [B] the relative cell addresses in Areas and References have to 
be interpreted as signed and relative to the current cell when contained in a shared formula.

Created attachment 19650
Patch for the bug
creator: ce@publishing-etc.de
apache@gagravarr.org
text:
Before we can apply the patch, we'll need to have a test for it. Unfortunately,
I don't quite understand what's currently wrong, so I can't write one...

Any chance you could upload a quick file that shows up the bug, and ideally also
a quick unit test that shows we're giving the wrong formula values? Once we have
that, we can commit the patch and know it's all working properly.
Thanks for the testcase, I've applied it to svn trunk
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
